title: (No. 49 of 2015)) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) (as adapted
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Reserve
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Reserve 

Members) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited garda siochana (reserve members) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: (No. 49 of 2015)) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) (as adapted
heading: 2. The Garda Síochána (Reserve Members) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 413
text_raw:
2. The Garda Síochána (Reserve Members) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 413 
of 2006) are amended in Regulation 4(1)(e)(i) by the substitution of “an EEA 
State, the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland or the Swiss 
Confederation,” for “an EEA State or the Swiss Confederation,”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Government hereby approve of the foregoing Regulations. 

[603] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 December, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [603] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
